page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES IN 1985
page.content: By Sharon Treherne. There are many games {indoor }and {outdoor. {Indoor.}People play games like monopoly,this is a board game involving paper money.Snakes and ladders is another board game but you dont have to concentrate as much as this game is for fun.Yahtzee is more or less a dice game once again for fun and you need to use your brains. Table tennis, This game is a miniature game of tennis. {Outdoor}games. Kerby. In kerby you need two people and a ball.Both players stand at each side of the road and take it in turn.You slam the ball and attempt to hit the other players kerb.Donkey.This is a catching the ball game.When a player drops it she is called D then O and so on.When it is dropped six times you are donkey and you have to sit out.
